name: Battle of the Bulge: the simulation game for the iPad
blurb: A simulation game of the Battle of the Bulge by John Butterfield, published by Shenandoah Studio coming to the iPad!

rewards.reward: YOU GET THE GAME, Battle of the Bulge, two glorious wallpapers for your iPad, and listing in the game credits as a FRIEND.
NEW! YOU GET BOTH GAMES: Battle of the Bulge AND El Alamein, plus four delightful wallpapers for your iPad, and listing in both games as a FRIEND.

Above + a ready-to-print PDF version of Battle of the Bulge as a board game (a $20 value); another wallpaper this time a detail of the Bulge map showing the Battle of Bastogne; an MP3 of the Bulge theme music; a copy of the Bulge Player\u2019s Guide in PDF format; credit as a SUPPORTER (rather than a Friend).
NEW: Above + ready-to-print PDF versions of the El Alamein game as board game, Player's Guide, and Designer's Guide; plus the Battle of the Bulge Designer's Guide PDF.

Above + a printed copy of the Bulge map on high-quality paper; the official Shenandoah Studio t-shirt; a copy of the Bulge Game Designer\u2019s Guide in PDF format; two phone ringtones based upon Bulge sound effects; the inclusion of a \u201cNICKNAME\u201d for yourself in the credits, i.e., Mark \u201cSmilin\u2019 Eyes\u201d Wilson. (Please add $20 for shipping outside the US, see the FAQ for details.)

Above except a Kickstarter exclusive Battle of the Bulge t-shirt replaces the Shenandoah t-shirt; plus printed Player\u2019s and Game Designer\u2019s Guide; exclusive voting rights to determine Bulge sequels; access to secret codes to display hidden content within Bulge \u2013 one includes your name; credited as a CHAMPION. (Please add $35 for shipping outside the US.)

Above (i.e., both t-shirts) plus a third personalized t-shirt; plus a complete copy of Battle of Bulge as a board game: mounted map, die-cut counters, and printed rules (a $50 value). Credited as a CHAMPION. (Please add $40 for shipping outside the US.)

Above + a second copy of the Battle of Bulge boardgame, with the map being signed by John Butterfield (game designer) and Pat Ward (graphic artist); play of a complete campaign game of Bulge on the iPad versus a Shenandoah staff member; membership in the Benefactors Forum where you will have direct access to the Shenandoah team; credited as a BENEFACTOR. (Please add $50 for shipping outside the US.)

Above + membership in the Shenandoah Studio Design Forum where upcoming games are discussed and planned, game art is reviewed and revised, and where playtest kits are distributed (you may opt out of this part as it requires a non-disclosure agreement \u2013 we talk serious business here and we would love to have your early input); you will become an official tester for all of Shenandoah\u2019s games (and credited as such) and will receive direct access to all our games while in development; another mounted Bulge map signed by the entire Shenandoah team; play of a complete campaign game of Bulge on the iPad versus Shenandoah\u2019s CEO, Eric Lee Smith; credited as a SPONSOR. (Please add $75 for shipping outside the US.)
